subject: [YouTrack, Updated] Issue codio-6455: File changes from terminal are not updated in file tree

 < https://codio.myjetbrains.com/youtrack/issue/codio-6455 >codio-6455< https://codio.myjetbrains.com/youtrack/issue/codio-6455 > File changes from terminal are not updated in file tree Created by Igor Yashtykov  
For example if on terminal call "touch file1" then there is no file1 in file tree, it appears only after resync tree
